title: Since Android 11 upgrade, Battery charging is super slow.
content:
Since Android 11 upgrade, battery is ages to charge.
Symptoms and results:-
1. Tried another Google OEM Pixel Fast Charger
2. Reboot multiple times.
3. Right now I my phone charged at 93% and it is still saying 27 mins to reach 100%
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
